text: Stephen N. Adubato Sr. (December 24, 1932 â€“ October 13, 2020) was an American politician and teacher. He was born in Newark, New Jersey.http://njmonthly.com/articles/lifestyle/people/hes-no-angel.html New Jersey Monthly 2008 In 1962, Adubato ran for office as a Democratic District Leader in Newark's North Ward, to which he was elected. In 1968 he was elected as North Ward Democratic party chairman.Schlager, Ken. "He's No Angel", njmonthly.com, October 13, 2009. Accessed January 6, 2010. He was one the executive board of the Newark Teachers' Union and worked as their legislative representative. Adubato Sr. died on October 13, 2020 in Newark at the age of 87. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Educators from Newark, New Jersey Category:Politicians from Newark, New Jersey Category:Businesspeople from Newark, New Jersey Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Steve Adubato Sr.
